1.「それ以上 近寄らんといて……。| 大丈夫や。大丈夫やから……。: Don't come any closer... it's okay. It's okay,|it's okay...

6.「ヨイちゃんのことが 気になって| こっそり 後をつけてきたの。| 何もなかった: I was worried about Yoi, so I secretly|followed him. I was going to leave right away|if nothing happened!

7.「でも 苦しそうなヨイちゃんを見ていたら| いてもたっても いられなくなって……: But when I saw Yoi in pain, I couldn't stand|still...

11.「テンジョウ チジョウ オボロゲナル| ハザマヨリウマレシ モウリョウヲ| ハラ: Tenjo chijo oborogenaru hazamayori umareshi|mouriowo haraiitamai kyometamae!

13.「アァァァァ！| ヵラダを ヵラダをヨコセェェェ！！: Aah! Get me Colorada, get me Colorada, get me|Colorada, get me Colorada!

17.「欲していた身体ではないが…… まァよい。| これも なかなか悪くない。陰衆 積: It's not the body I wanted, but... oh well.|This is not so bad. Inshu, I'll take over for|you and clear away your long held grudges.

18.「遠からず この身体を 完全に我が物とする。| その時を せいぜ……い 楽しみに:
In the not-too-distant future, I will own this|body completely. You can look forward to that|time at best. Weak chieftain of the|
|underworld...

19.「うそや……。| なんで こんなことに……。: No way... why did this happen...

20.「自分の中でうごめく 何者かが| ウチの身体を狙ってるんは わかってた。| せや: I knew that there was something inside of me|that was trying to get to me. So I knew I had|to do something.

21.「ほんで <pc>に相談しようとしたんや。| せやのに なんで よりによって ア: Then I tried to talk to <pc> about|it. So why, of all people, would Asahi cover|for us, and then we end up in this mess!

22.「ウチの中から出てきた何者か……アイツは| 陰衆の積年の怨念が どうとか言うてた:
The person who came out from inside our|house... he said something about a long-|standing grudge against the Yinshu. Maybe it|
|has something to do with the Yinshu's past.

23.「ちょうど ウチのばあちゃんが王都勤めの陰衆の| 巡察のために カミハルムイに: My grandma is just coming to Kamiharmui to|inspect the Yinshu, the Royal City workers.|She should know something about this.

24.「なぁ。王都カミハルムイ南の 宿屋の２階に| 来てくれへんやろか？ 一緒に ばあ: Hey. Could you come to Inn 2F of Royal City|Kamiharmui South?　Together, we will find out|how to rescue Asahi from Granny.

25.「お願い。どうか……| アサヒを…… アサヒを……。: Please. Please... let Asahi... let Asahi...

26.「この奥に 先々代の陰衆の頭領……| サヨばあちゃんが おるはずや。: In the back of this room, there should be|Sayo's grandmother, the leader of the Yinshu|before her.

27.「陰衆の長老 サヨおばあさま。| ご挨拶が 遅うなり 申し訳ありません。| 今代: Elder of the Yinshu, Grandmother Sayo. I|apologize for the delay in greeting you. I am|Yoi, the leader of this generation.

28.「あらまぁ。| ずいぶん 懐かしい声やこと。: Oh, my. That's a very nostalgic voice.

29.「久しぶりに 孫に会える思うて| 楽しみにしとったんよ。| さぞや お仕事が は: I was looking forward to seeing my grandson|for the first time in a long time. I bet|you're getting along just fine, aren't you?

30.「私は ロクに挨拶にも 来いひん| そんな礼節も わきまえないような子に| しつ: I don't remember training a child who had no|sense of propriety, who didn't even come to|greet me.

31.「ごめんて サヨばあちゃん。| すぐ 来るつもりやってんけど……| ちょっと 困: Sorry, Grandma Sayo. I was going to come over|right away, but... things got a little out of|hand.

32.「……はて。じつの祖母に 挨拶にくるよりも| 優先せな あかんこととは| いった: Well.... What on earth is a bigger priority|than coming to say hello to my grandmother?

34.「ウチの影から おぞましい魔物が生まれて| アサヒが アサヒの身体が……| 魔物: A horrifying monster was born from our shadow,|and Asahi's body... was taken over by the|monster.

35.「アサヒやて？| あの小憎たらしい 陽衆の娘のことかえ？: Asahi? You mean that little hateful Yang Clan|girl?

36.「……そうや。 | 魔物は 陰衆の積年の怨念がどうとか言うてた。| 何か 陰衆に:
That's right. The monsters were saying|something about a long-standing grudge against|the Yinshu. I thought it might have something|
|to do with the Yinshu.

37.「ばあちゃん。アサヒを助ける方法を| 知っとったら 教えてくれへん？: Grandma. If you know how to help Asahi, would|you please tell me?

38.「ずいぶん その陽衆のアサヒとやらと| 仲良うしてはるようやねえ？ 落陽の草原で: You seem to be getting along well with this|Asahi of the Yang Clan, don't you?　I saw them|together at Sunset Meadow.

39.「あんな陽衆の小娘と つるんでからに。| ……しまいには その陽衆を 助けたいや: After hanging out with that little Yang Clan|girl. And then you want to help that Yang|Clan? Just leave that kind of thing alone.

40.「そやかて あの魔物は ウチから生まれたんや。| ほっとけるわけないやん。それに:
That's right. That monster was born from us.|There's no way we can leave it alone. Besides,|we don't know what kind of misfortune that|
|monster will bring.

41.「ばあちゃん お願いします。この通りや。| どないなことでもええ。あの魔物につい: Grandma, please. Just like that. Anything you|want. If you know anything about that monster,|please tell us.

42.「……そんなもん 知りまへんわ。| せやけど……: I don't know anything about that. But...

43.「確かに その魔物っちゅうんのを放っておくのは| 危険やね。ほんなら そんなもの: It is indeed dangerous to leave that monster|unattended. Then, why don't you just bury that|little Yang Clan girl?

44.「ヨイ。ええか？ これは 因果や。| あの小娘が これまで陰衆をコケにしてきた|: Yoi. You okay?　This is karma. That little girl|has been mocking the yin people, and now the|karmic retribution has come.

45.「そんなことあらへん！ これからは陽衆と陰衆が| 手を取りあっていこうって 和解:
That's not true! From now on, the Yang Clan|and the Yin Clan have made peace by working|hand in hand. Even grandma knows that, don't|
|you?

46.「だまらっしゃい！ 私は そないなこと| 許した覚えは ありまへん。我ら陰衆の祖:
Stop talking! I have no intention of allowing|such a thing. I can't tell you how much our|ancestors of the Yinshu have suffered from|
|such frustration.

47.「……とにかく。お前が やらんって言うなら | 私が 災いを 止めるしかありまへ: Anyway... If you won't do it, I'll have to|stop the plague. It's hard for an old man to|talk about this.

48.「ほな 行くで。| ひと仕事や。: Well, let's go. I've got work to do.

50.「<pc>…… どないしよ？| いったん 陽衆の隠れ家に戻ろか……。: <pc>... what are we going to do?|Let's go back to the Yang Clan Hideout for a|while...

51.「<cs_pchero> お待たせ。| 天地の儀をおこなう 覚悟は できとる。: <cs_pchero> Sorry to keep you waiting. I am|ready to perform the rites of heaven and|earth.

52.「せやけど 知っての通り 天地の儀は| 儀式をおこなう ふたりの心……| 陰と陽:
But as you know, the rituals of heaven and|earth cannot succeed unless the two minds that|perform them, the yin and the yang, become|
|one.

53.「陽衆の頭領である アサヒがおらん今 | その代わりを 務められる者は| <cs: With the Yang Clan chieftain, Asahi, gone,|there is no one but you <cs_pchero> who can|take his place.

54.「ウチも <cs_pchero>となら | 心を ひとつにできると 思うとる。|: I also think that we can unite our hearts with|<cs_pchero>. What do you think?　Will you|perform the ritual with me?<yesno><close>

55.「……いけずなこと 言わんといて。| これは アサヒを救うためにも 必要なんや。: Don't say such a naughty thing. This is|necessary to save Asahi. Will you perform the|ritual with us?<yesno><close>

56.「ほんま おおきに。恩に着るわ。: Thank you very much. I owe you.

57.「ウチが 呪文を唱えるから <cs_pchero>は| それに合わせて 祈ってて: I'll cast the spell, and you <cs_pchero>|just pray along with it. All right, let's get|started.

61.<center>我が名は テンオツ貴人……。|あまつちに 和を もたらす者。: My name is Nobleman Tenotsu, and I am the one|who brings harmony to our land.

62.<center>芽吹く花々。空は光り輝き。|水は流れ めぐりゆく。|とどこおりな: Flowers budding. The sky shines. Water flows|and flows. All is harmony itself.

63.<center>我を呼び覚ませし 陰衆の頭領よ……|汝は 我に 何を求めるのか？: Awaken me, chieftain of the underworld, what|do you seek from me? If you want my help, you|must show me your determination.

65.「コイツらを 倒さんと| 話を 聞いてもらえんようやね。| 行くで <cs_pc: I guess we'll have to beat these guys to get|them to listen to us. Let's go <cs_pchero>.

66.<center>我が獣たちを しりぞけるか……。|話を聞こう 陰衆の頭領よ。: If you would make my beasts flinch... let us|hear what you have to say, chieftain of the|Yin.

67.「ウチから 生まれた魔物のせいで| 陽衆の頭領である アサヒが| 身体を のっと: Asahi, the chieftain of the Yang Clan, has had|his body taken over by a monster that was born|from his home.

68.「大幻魔 テンオツ貴人さまなら| 何か 彼女を救う方法を ご存じかと考え| 恐れ:
I thought that the great phantasmal Nobleman|Tenotsu might have some way to save her, and|so, with all due respect, I asked for your|
|help in this matter.

69.<center>強き闇を制するには 強き心が必要。|闇を御しきれぬ者は|やがて: A strong heart is necessary to conquer a|strong darkness. Those who cannot control the|darkness will soon find themselves undermined.

70.<center>闇の名は…… 陰果の罪業。|陰衆が紡いできた因果は 未熟な頭領が:
The name of darkness is... Sin of Yin/Yang. It|seems that the causality spun by the Yinshu is|too heavy for an inexperienced chieftain to|
|bear alone.

71.「陰果の罪業……。| それは 陰衆の頭領であるウチが 弱いから| この事態を 招: Sin of Yin/Yang... does that mean that we, as|the chieftains of the Yin, have brought about|this situation because we are weak?

72.<center>無論 かつての天地雷鳴士の歴史にも|同じような 変事はあった。|:
Of course, there have been similar incidents|in the history of druids in the past. A|chieftain who cannot control the darkness will|
|bring disaster to the world.

73.「そないなこと……。| ウチは どないしたら ええんでしょうか？: What should we do about that?

74.<center>……なすべきは ひとつ。|かつての天地雷鳴士が 災いを食い止めた: There is only one thing to do. Find the secret|that Druid once used to stop the plague.

75.「すべては ウチの弱さが 招いたこと？| ウチ もしかして まだ| 心の奥底では: Was it all brought about by our weakness? Do|you think that deep down we still have|feelings for Asahi?

76.「ううん。今は 迷ってるヒマやない。| ウチが どうにかせんと アサヒは……。: No, I don't think so. Now is not the time to|be lost. If we don't do something, Asahi|will...

77.「そのためにも テンオツ貴人が言うてた| かつての天地雷鳴士が 使ったという|: To do so, we must find the secret technique|that Nobleman Tenotsu said was used by the|druids of the past.

78.「ウチが探しておくから <cs_pchero>は| それまで 身体を 休めといて: We'll look for you, <cs_pchero> just rest|your body until then.

79.「それから ここまで 協力してくれた礼や。| 遠慮せんと 受け取っとき。: Also, this is a thank-you for helping us get|this far. Don't hesitate to take it.

80.「また 何か進展があったら| <cs_pchero>を 呼ぶさかい。| その時は: I will call <cs_pchero> if there are any|more developments. If you do, please lend me|your help.
